ing: 12 green apples - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
1/3 cup brown sugar, or more to taste
1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, or more to taste (optional)
des: "A recipe I always keep on hand. It has proven addicting and has replaced desserts after meals for me. I even put it in my hot cereal."
ins:
Combine apples, raspberries, water, brown sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a slow cooker crock.
Cook on Low until apples can easily be mashed, about 6 hours.
